title: Destroyer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to Slaughter. You may select one or multiple targets to attack, spending a charge for each target selected.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 2 charges of Slaughter.
- You gain a charge every time you're voted for, up to a max of 4 each day.
- Roleblock immune while attacking multiple players. If you attack only one player, you instead clean them.
- You cannot attack the night after you kill only one player. This restriction does not apply if you kill multiple players.
- You gain detection immunity on nights that you cannot attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4270
*The heavy-handed blade scraped upon the ground, slicing a wound into the earth. The town decimated, she announced the demise: "All men are created equal - all men must die equal." The town was swallowed into the earth, and where mankind once had thrived, there was now only a barren patch of cracked dirt.*
